etymology.description: 彭 + 丽 + 媛 = surname Peng + beautiful + graceful lady.
etymology.interpretation: A Chinese female personal name: 彭 is the family name; 丽媛 together suggests “beautiful, elegant lady.”
etymology.simplification: 麗 → 丽 was simplified to reduce strokes and streamline the graph; 彭 and 媛 are unchanged.

parts.english: surname Peng; ancient state name; booming (sound); exuberant

examples.chinese: 彭丽媛是著名的歌唱家(彭麗媛是著名的歌唱家)。
examples.pinyin: Péng Lìyuán shì zhùmíng de gēchàngjiā.
examples.english: Peng Liyuan is a renowned singer.

examples.chinese: 很多人知道她的艺术成就(很多人知道她的藝術成就)。
examples.pinyin: Hěn duō rén zhīdào tā de yìshù chéngjiù.
examples.english: Many people know her artistic achievements.

examples.chinese: 她的名字中“丽”与“媛”都有美好的含义(她的名字中「麗」與「媛」都有美好的含義)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de míngzì zhōng “Lì” yǔ “Yuán” dōu yǒu měihǎo de hányì.
examples.english: In her name, both “Li” and “Yuan” carry positive meanings.
